00018 #ifndef GUARD_DELEGATES_CONNECTION_HPP_INCLUDED
00019 #define GUARD_DELEGATES_CONNECTION_HPP_INCLUDED 1
00020 #include "../DelegateN/DelegateBase.hpp"
00021 namespace DL
00022 {
00025   class Connection
00026   {
00027   public:
00028     Connection() 
00029     : m_connected(false), m_enabled(true),m_signal(0)
00030     {}
00034     Connection( DelegateObj con ) 
00035     : m_connected(false), m_enabled(true),m_signal(0)
00036     {
00037       this->connect(con);
00038     }
00039     ~Connection() 
00040     {
00041       this->disconnect();
00042     }
00046     void enable(bool state = true)
00047     {
00048       this->m_enabled = state;
00049     }
00052     bool is_enabled()
00053     {
00054       return m_enabled;
00055     }
00058     void disconnect()
00059     {
00060       if(this->m_signal)
00061         delete this->m_signal;
00062       this->m_signal = NULL;
00063       this->enable();
00064       this->m_connected=false;
00065     }
00068     void connect(DelegateObj signal)
00069     {
00070       this->disconnect();
00071       if(signal.get() == 0)
00072         return;
00073       this->m_signal = signal.release();   
00074       this->enable(false);
00075       this->m_connected = true;
00076     }
00079     void emit()
00080     {
00081       if(!this->m_enabled)
00082         this->m_signal->Invoke();
00083     }
00084     private:
00085     Connection(Connection const & other){}
00086     Connection & operator=(Connection &){}
00087     DelegateBase *m_signal;
00088     bool m_connected;
00089     bool m_enabled;
00090   };
00091            
00092 } // namespace DL
00093 #endif // GUARD_DELEGATES_CONNECTION_HPP_INCLUDED
